mods.abstract: The Great Sphinx at Gizeh (Old Kingdom Dynasty IV); the Dream Stele of Thutmose IV, erected 1401 B.C.E., before the partially unexcavated Great Sphinx, three Egyptian men stand on or near paws; Pyramid of Khafre and Pyramid of Menkaure (background); "Sphinx Armachis No. 11 Phot. Art. G. Lekegian & Co." in white and black along bottom of print. (Number on object is 3/655).

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
